panels.description: This represents the size of a message in Redis, this is useful to tell what's the average size of a batch.
panels.title: Stream Message Size

panels.description: This represents individually the length of a log line.
panels.title: Stream Log Line Length

panels.description: Active streams means how many streams were not closed yet. This metric can be useful to understand how many streams are getting closed correctly or how many streams are active.
panels.title: Stream Active / Opened / Closed by Account ID
Stream Memory Usage by Account ID
